title: My Firend's Father Nand Kishore Can Defeat Cancer With Your Support.
selftext:
I don't where should i ask for this so I'm posting in some big reddit community So mod please don't remove my post.

My friend's name is *Kishan* and I am raising funds for my father *Nand Kisor* who is suffering from *Tongue Cancer* and is undergoing treatment. 

Our estimated target is *INR 8 lakhs,* which will cover the medical expenses, Chemotherpies, hospital bills, and medications. Please help if you can even as ₹100

Donations site [Link](https://www.impactguru.com/fundraiser/kindly-help-nand-kishore) for cross checking that this not any fake


- UPI ID - 9599256947@

- UPI NO - 9810343840
comments: Thank you to everyone who upvote my post and if you donate even a little amount I'm so grateful of you
